text: The 2015 European Karate Championships, the 50th edition, was held at Istanbul in Turkey from 19 to 22 March 19 2015. A total of 482 competitors from 47 countries participated at the event. ==Participating countries== ==Medalists== ===Men's competition=== ====Individual==== {| |- | Kata | Damián Quintero | Mehmet
